FuncDef: The display vrrp6 binding command displays the binding between a management Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol for IPv6 (mVRRP6) group and a service VRRP6 backup group. The display vrrp6 binding command displays the binding between a management Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol for IPv6 (mVRRP6) group and a service VRRP6 backup group. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display vrrp6 binding [ interface { <admin-if-name> | <admin-if-type> <admin-if-num> } ] [ vrid <admin-vrid-value> ] [ member-vrrp [ interface { <member-if-name> | <member-if-type> <member-if-num> } ] [ vrid <member-vrid-value> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface on which an mVRRP6 group is configured.
-

Specifies the type and number of an interface on which a service VRRP6 backup group is configured.
-

Specifies the ID of an mVRRP6 group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

Specifies the ID of a service VRRP6 group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.
